Articles.Content:
This will be a series of streams with a goal; colonize Laythe. With plenty of ore, a breathable atmosphere and some liquid that looks like water, it's an optimal place to start a colony.

Twitch channel

I haven't quite worked out a schedule yet, but I'll post here around half an hour before I stream.
Will stream in one hour and four minutes, that is 12:00 UTC!
Okay, changed my mind! We're goin live as soon as my KSP is loaded!
